name: Lager Network Technologies Game Resource Archive

description: Lager Network Technologies is a software developer that specializes in producing massively multiplayer online (MMO) video games. Some of the games Lager Network Technologies develops use game resource archives that are saved as LPQ files.

Primarily, LPQ files contain images that are shown in-game. For example, an LPQ file may contain textures, icons, and other images. LPQ files are compressed using LZO (Lempel-Ziv-Oberhume) compression.
